Hero_Description: We introduce you to the Community that will teach you the marketing, sales, content creation and business strategies that will lead you to earn more than $1000 USD per month, without years of experience, university degree or thousands of followers.
Emphatize_Heading: FOR THOSE WHO ALWAYS LOOKED FOR A ENVIRONMENT THAT SUPPORTS THEM , POWERFUL AND LEADS THEM TO REACH THEIR GOALS
Emphatize_P1: It is not easy. It is difficult. It is going to require a lot of effort, dedication and perseverance. And for that reason, it is “too good to be true Because only 1% of the population is willing to work with effort, dedication and perseverance to achieve their goals.
Emphatize_P2: Do you really want to change your life and have the results that no one else has?
Emphatize_P3: It's a point of no return. Once you enter this world, there is no turning back. Understand that, at the end of the day, everything depends on you. The good, the bad, everything.
Emphatize_P4: The results you see in all of these people are real. And even though the Matrix has made you believe that there are no other ways to make money, you can see with your own eyes: there are.
Offer_Skills_1_Desc: You will learn the most in-demand skills on the market. Skills that will allow you to generate your first income, and once you are established in the market, thousands of dollars.
Offer_Skills_2_Desc: We teach you how to package your offer so that when you offer your service, it is very difficult for your potential clients to say no.
Offer_Skills_3_Desc: Learn how to find potential clients who want to buy your services, the best techniques to capture their attention, and finally to get them to pay you.
Offer_Skills_4_Desc: Whenever you offer an expensive service, you have to understand the following: sales calls are going to be essential to close this type of sales. And therefore, it is essential that you understand how you should approach a call, and what techniques you should use to close them.
Offer_Community_Desc_1: It's not all about money, that's why we're in community.
Offer_Community_Desc_2: In it we promote both financial and personal development of all members, and We prepare to have an unbreakable mentality, abundant, and prepared for anything.
Offer_Accesses_PortalCircle_Desc: In which you will have full access to all courses, discussion portals, challenges, much more within the Community.
Offer_Accesses_Discord_Desc: A Server in which you will meet all the members of the Community, to resolve all your questions, doubts, obtain clarity, make friends, partners, or for whatever you need.
Courses_1_Desc: A step by step on how to create an offer, what to take into account when structuring it, and how to sell it for more than $500 USD.
Courses_2_Desc: Learn how to create Sales Funnels, both to organically attract your customers (in case you create content and are creating an audience), and to go find a cold audience that may be interested in your product or service .
Courses_3_Desc: A complete guide on how to edit videos like a professional, step by step, so you can offer your networks on social networks and work with content creators interested in them.
Courses_4_Desc: How to write persuasively to capture the attention of the masses and convert words into customers.
Courses_5_Desc: Learn to use tools like Photoshop or Midjourney to become an expert in designs of all kinds, and thus offer your Branding services to personal and business brands.
Courses_6_Desc: Learn how to convert followers, messages, and conversations into money, with our customer acquisition methods through Instagram.
Courses_7_Desc: Learn how to create a successful profile, create lists with potential clients who want to purchase your services, and offer it in the most effective way possible.
Courses_8_Desc: Understand the psychology of selling, the aspects to take into account when selling and getting on a sales call, and how to jump over objections like a master to close as many sales as possible.
WhyUs_P1: We want you to learn from people who have the results you want to achieve.
WhyUs_P2: This is why all the teachers within the Community already generate thousands of dollars with the methods we teach.
WhyUs_P3: That's why we founded this Community, so that you can do the same thing we did, and so that you can learn from all those who did it with their respective skill.
WhyUs_Item1_Description: We are going to show you the systems that we apply to achieve the results we have, and invoice $10,000, $40,000, and up to $70,000 USD per month with your online business.
WhyUs_Item2_Description: We understand that everything starts with the mindset, and if you can't visualize yourself in the position of someone who generates thousands of dollars per month, you will never achieve it. That's why in the Community we support and encourage each other to act despite motivation, and give everything to achieve our goals.
WhyUs_Item3_Description: You will surround yourself with hundreds of people who are on the same path, not only so that you can motivate yourself by seeing how others equally capable are generating thousands of dollars more; but also so that you can make friends, businesses, and Form lasting relationships with people who share your goals in life.
Pricing_Title: Are you ready to escape the Matrix?
Questions_Calendly_Desc: If you have questions, you can schedule a call with our sales team by clicking on this
Questions_Doubts_1_Description: The content of the community is intended both for people who are just starting out in this world, as well as for those who are already a little more advanced and want to get a boost. The important thing about the community is the environment. It is the possibility of surrounding yourself with people with the same aspirations and goals, and perhaps with some who are a couple of steps ahead.
Questions_Doubts_2_Heading: How do I make my money count in the community?
Questions_Doubts_2_Description: Consume all the content of the courses, actively participate in the community, ask all your questions, and don't stop iterating and working on building your business. It's the only way to succeed.
Questions_Doubts_3_Heading: How do I cancel my subscription?
Questions_Doubts_3_Description: Very simple. In your Circle profile, in the “Billing” section, you will be able to access your subscription details and cancel it immediately.
Questions_Doubts_4_Description: We do not have a refund policy. If you no longer wish to pay for the community, you can unsubscribe at any time.
Questions_Doubts_5_Heading: What happens if I want to unsubscribe from the community?
Questions_Doubts_5_Description: You are free to leave the community whenever you want. Now, if your subscription lasted less than a year, you will not be able to re-enter the community for another year.
Questions_Doubts_6_Heading: Can I become a community affiliate?
Questions_Doubts_6_Description: Yes. The system is not ready yet, but you will have an affiliate link so that, for each person who enters through said link, $15 USD will be credited to your PayPal account. We encourage everyone to take advantage of this system since it allows us all to win.
